## Carry Recipe
_Ring Jordan’s Back Carry – Base Size – Traditional Sling Pass + Cross Pass + Torso Pass_
- Traditional Sling Pass over baby on back
- Thread both tails through ring
- Shoulder flip with under arm tail over same shoulder and across baby for a Cross Pass
- Under arm with other tail and Torso Pass over baby
- Tails come around, over, and through the ring
